bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition erroneous writing of leng pi zhu 冷痹疰 , cold blockage attachment-illness, identical with pian feng 偏風 , unilateral wind. See Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 , Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry fu zi 附 子 where leng pi zhu 冷痹疰 is erroneously recorded as leng pi zhu 冷癖疰 , “Cold aggregation-illness attachment-illness ”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu zi 附子 again changes leng pi zhu 冷癖疰 to ling pi zhu 令癖疰 , “Causes aggregation-illness attachment-illness ”.
